featureSchema.name: Customization
featureSchema.description: Provides users with the ability to personalize the look and feel of the app, including themes, colors, and task prioritization.
featureSchema.userStory: As a user, I want to customize the application interface and task settings so that it fits my personal style and workflow.
featureSchema.acceptanceCriteria: Users must be able to select different themes and colors. Additionally, task prioritization (e.g., High, Medium, Low) should be easily configurable.
featureSchema.additional: Include settings persistence so that customizations are saved across sessions.
featureSchema.prompt: Create a customization module that allows users to change themes, select colors, and set task priorities. Ensure that changes persist across user sessions.
featureSchema.notes: Consider providing default themes along with options for user-defined customization.
